document_data.name: Elda
document_data.mainbody:
'''Elda''' was a Night Blade who resided in the ruined [[Temple of Bhaal (Undercity)|Temple of Bhaal]] in the [[Undercity]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''When I squeeze, I make sure they're quiet. I made them all quiet now.''|Night Blade Elda}}
document_data.Description: Elda was a red-headed and pale-skinned [[human]] woman armed with two [[dagger]]s.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Night Blade Elda killed by strangulation in service of [[Bhaal]], the Lord of Murder and his [[Chosen]] â€“ [[Orin the Red]]. Thorough servitude to Orin, Elda supported the [[Cult of the Absolute]] that threatened the city of Baldur's Gate
